Description.Details:
A unique modification of a standard Particle Projector Cannon, the Snub PPC shortens a standard PPC, leading to a lighter and more compact weapon system. The trade-off is a shorter range and damage fallof at long ranges.
The last remaining (magnetic) focusing lens can be disabled, leading to an increase in damage, but spread over a larger area.

Modes.Name: No Focusing Lens
Modes.Description: Disabled focusing lens leads to more overall damage, spread all over the target.
